entry.title: Adcraft Upright Electric Glass Washer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Adcraft
Type: Unknown
Price: 479.00

Adcraft's "Redhead" electric glass washer is made of heavy duty construction with a powerful 1/3 HP motor. It easily removes lipstick and other stains on the glass surface. Quick and easy to install, it runs off a 115V circuit that draws only 4.3 Amps. Comes complete with four 7" brushes and one 8-3/4" center brush. The brushes are interchangeable with all major brand's brushes. Overall dimensions are 19"H x 8.75"W x 15.75"D. Retail Pack. NEMA 5-15 plug. CE.

entry.title: Adcraft WB-40 Stainless Steel 60 Cup Water Boiler with Variable Temp Control
entry.summary:
Vendor: Adcraft
Type: Hot Water Dispensers
Price: 199.00

Adcraft WB-40 Stainless Steel 60 Cup Water Boiler with Variable Temp Control

  • Adcraft's 40 cup stainless steel water boiler is ideal for any institution, church, cafeteria, etc.
  • All parts are constructed of durable stainless steel and each unit is equipped with a clear water level gauge.
  • Extra large encapsulated heating element is waterproof and is made to last.
  • Variable temperature control knob and heat resistant handles and knob.
  • Illuminated power switch to know when the unit is in use.. 120V, 1350W, 11.25 Amps. 3' power cord with NEMA 5-15 plug.
  • ETL Listed and ETL Sanitation.

entry.title: Adcraft Stainless Steel Countertop Electric Infrared Display Warmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Adcraft
Type: Countertop Food Warmers
Price: 279.00

Adcraft's IDW-940W Infrared Display Warmer is constructed of heavy duty stainless steel. This new display warmer can be used in the kitchen as a fried food holding station and in the front of the house to keep hot food on display for an extended period of time as a self serve station. Instead of bulbs, this item uses heating elements that give off a more uniform heat distribution. Polished stainless steel reflectors located above the heating elements help radiate the heat down towards the food zone below. The raised base keeps the food pan off the work area preventing it from getting hot and allows for easy accessibility of the food from all three sides. This display warmer comes complete with a 2" deep full size food pan with removable stainless steel perforated liner for drainage of excess grease. 13"W x 22.5"D x 19.75"H. 120V, 940W and 7.8 Amps. CE. 1 year warranty on parts and labor.
